com.shopify.buy.dataprovider

Class BuyClientBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.shopify.buy.dataprovider.BuyClientBuilder

  • public final class BuyClientBuilder
extends Object
    Builds default implementation of BuyClient

      • productPageSize

        public BuyClientBuilder productPageSize(int productPageSize)
        Sets the page size used for paged product API queries. The number of Product to include in a page. The maximum page size is MAX_PAGE_SIZE and the minimum page size is MIN_PAGE_SIZE. If the page size is less than MIN_PAGE_SIZE, it will be set to MIN_PAGE_SIZE. If the page size is greater than MAX_PAGE_SIZE it will be set to MAX_PAGE_SIZE. The default value is DEFAULT_PAGE_SIZE
        Parameters:
        productPageSize - The number of products to return in a page.
        Returns:
        a BuyClientBuilder

      • networkRequestRetryPolicy

        public BuyClientBuilder networkRequestRetryPolicy(int networkRequestRetryMaxCount,
                                                  long networkRequestRetryDelayMs,
                                                  float networkRequestRetryBackoffMultiplier)
        Sets the configuration for retry logic in case network request failed (socket timeout, unknown host, etc.). The minimum of the delay between retries should be greater than MIN_NETWORK_RETRY_DELAY, otherwise it will be set to MIN_NETWORK_RETRY_DELAY
        Parameters:
        networkRequestRetryMaxCount - max count of retry attempts
        networkRequestRetryDelayMs - delay between retry attempts in milliseconds
        networkRequestRetryBackoffMultiplier - backoff multiplier for next request attempts, can be used for "exponential backoff"
        Returns:
        a BuyClientBuilder

      • httpTimeout

        public BuyClientBuilder httpTimeout(long httpConnectionTimeoutMs,
                                    long httpReadWriteTimeoutMs)
        Sets the default http timeouts for new connections. A value of 0 means no timeout, otherwise values must be between 1 and Long.MAX_VALUE.
        Parameters:
        httpConnectionTimeoutMs - default connect timeout for new connections in milliseconds
        httpReadWriteTimeoutMs - default read/write timeout for new connections in milliseconds
        Returns:
        BuyClientBuilder

      • build

        public BuyClient build()
        Builds default implementation of BuyClient
        Returns:
        A BuyClient.
